msg: HIVE-6726 : Hcat cli does not close SessionState (Sushanth Sowmyan, reviewed by Thejas M Nair)

author: jukka
msg: OAK-1702: Create a benchmark for Full text search
Perform 100 full text queries per test iteration to get more accurate test results.
Call getString() on the matching title/text properties and aggregate the results to prevent the JIT compiler from optimizing away unused bits of code.
Also give more time for initial indexing
